      void DELETE_FILES_FOLDER_CREATED()
      Summary Delete extra files and folders created during all the test cases of Share folder Pre-Conditions DashBoard page should be open Steps Select folder Click on delete button in ToolBar Click on OK button Expected Result: Verify folders which were created during all the Share folder test cases should not be present to root location
      void INHERITED_PERMISSIONS_SHARED_FOLDER_TC()
      Summary Inherited Permissions in Shared Folder Pre-Conditions DashBoard page should be open Steps Login with One user Create Parent and Child folders Share Parent folder with other user Click on Share button in ToolBar Login with another user Accept Folder Invitation Share Child folder with another user Click on Share button in ToolBar Login with another user Accept Folder Invitation Select Child folder Open Share History Expected Result: Verify Inherited Permissions message should be present in share history
      void NOTIFICATIONS_AT_OWNERS_END_TC()
      Summary Notifications at Owner's end Pre-Conditions DashBoard page should be open Steps Login with One user Select Folder Click on Share button in ToolBar Add Shared UserName Login with another user Accept Folder Invitation File added by reviewer Folder added by reviewer File renamed by reviewer Folder renamed by reviewer Clean Metadata operation on file by reviewer Convert to PDF operation on file by reviewer Compare two files by reviewer Copy files to shared folder by reviewer (Pending) Move files to shared folder by reviewer (Pending) Copy folder to shared folder by reviewer Move folder to shared folder by reviewer Expected Result: Verify Notifications at Owner's end
      void NOTIFICATIONS_AT_REVIEWERS_END_TC()
      Summary Notifications at Reviewer's end Pre-Conditions DashBoard page should be open Steps Login with One user Select Folder Click on Share button in ToolBar Add Shared UserName Login with another user Accept Folder Invitation File added by owner Folder added by owner File renamed by owner Folder renamed by owner File removed by owner Folder removed by owner Copy files to shared folder by owner Move files to shared folder by owner Copy folder to shared folder by owner Move folder to shared folder by owner Expected Result: Verify Notifications at Reviewer's end

      Summary Reject share folder invitation Pre-Conditions DashBoard page should be open Steps Login with One user Select Folder Add Shared UserName Click on Share button in ToolBar Login with another user Reject Folder Invitation Expected Result: Verify Folder should not be present in shared user

      void SHARE_FOLDER_EXPIRY_DATE_TC()
      Summary Verify the functionality of expiry date for share folder Pre-Conditions DashBoard page should be open Steps Login with One user Select Folder Click on Share button in ToolBar Enter internal Share user name Verify Expiry date field is present or not Enter External Share user name Verify Expiry date field is present or not Click on Cancel button Expected Result: Verify that for internal user expiry date field should not be present and for external user expiry date should be present

      • SHARE_FOLDER_VIA_TOOLBAR_TC

        public void SHARE_FOLDER_VIA_TOOLBAR_TC()
        Summary
        Share folder with another user via tool bar
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select Folder
        3. Add Shared UserName
        4. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        5. Login with another user
        6. Accept Folder Invitation
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify Folder should be present in shared user

      • SHARE_FOLDER_VIA_CONTEXT_MENU_TC

        public void SHARE_FOLDER_VIA_CONTEXT_MENU_TC()
        Summary
        Share folder with another user via context menu
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select Folder
        3. Right click on folder
        4. click on Share option in context menu
        5. Add Shared UserName
        6. Login with another user
        7. Accept Folder Invitation
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify Folder should be present in shared user

      • SHARE_FOLDER_EXPIRY_DATE_TC

        public void SHARE_FOLDER_EXPIRY_DATE_TC()
        Summary
        Verify the functionality of expiry date for share folder
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select Folder
        3. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        4. Enter internal Share user name
        5. Verify Expiry date field is present or not
        6. Enter External Share user name
        7. Verify Expiry date field is present or not
        8. Click on Cancel button
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify that for internal user expiry date field should not be present and for external user expiry date should be present

      • CHANGE_PERMISSION_OF_USER_SHARE_FOLDER_TC

        public void CHANGE_PERMISSION_OF_USER_SHARE_FOLDER_TC()
        Summary
        Change Permission of User For Share Folder
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select Folder
        3. Add Shared UserName
        4. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        5. Login with another user
        6. Accept Folder Invitation
        7. Change permission for the user multiple times
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify that permission changed, should be reflect to particular user.

      • CHANGE_EXPIRY_DATE_OF_SHARE_FOLDER_TC

        public void CHANGE_EXPIRY_DATE_OF_SHARE_FOLDER_TC()
        Summary
        Change Expiry date of Share Folder
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select Folder
        3. Add Shared External UserName
        4. Set Expiry date
        5. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        6. Login with external user
        7. Accept Folder Invitation
        8. Verify Expiry date
        9. Login with first user (owner of the folder)
        10. Change Expiry date for the shared external user
        11. Login with another user (external user)
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify that expiry date changed, should be reflect to particular user.

      • SHARE_ALREADY_SHARED_FOLDER_WITH_ANOTHER_GROUP

        public void SHARE_ALREADY_SHARED_FOLDER_WITH_ANOTHER_GROUP()
        Summary
        Share already Shared Folder with Another Group
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select Folder
        3. Add Group name to share
        4. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        5. Login with another user which belongs to shared group
        6. Accept Folder Invitation
        7. Again Login with First user
        8. Select Same folder
        9. Add another Group name to share
        10. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        11. Login with another user which belongs to shared group
        12. Accept Folder Invitation
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify Folder should be present in shared user

      • SHARE_ALREADY_SHARED_FOLDER_WITH_ANOTHER_USER_OUTSIDE_FROM_GROUP

        public void SHARE_ALREADY_SHARED_FOLDER_WITH_ANOTHER_USER_OUTSIDE_FROM_GROUP()
        Summary
        Share already Shared Folder with any user outside from Group
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select Folder
        3. Add Group name to share
        4. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        5. Login with another user which belongs to shared group
        6. Accept Folder Invitation
        7. Again Login with First user
        8. Select Same folder
        9. Add another user outside from group
        10. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        11. Login with another user which does not belongs to shared group
        12. Accept Folder Invitation
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify Folder should be present in shared user

      • INHERITED_PERMISSIONS_SHARED_FOLDER_TC

        public void INHERITED_PERMISSIONS_SHARED_FOLDER_TC()
        Summary
        Inherited Permissions in Shared Folder
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Create Parent and Child folders
        3. Share Parent folder with other user
        4. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        5. Login with another user
        6. Accept Folder Invitation
        7. Share Child folder with another user
        8. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        9. Login with another user
        10. Accept Folder Invitation
        11. Select Child folder
        12. Open Share History
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify Inherited Permissions message should be present in share history

      • NOTIFICATIONS_AT_OWNERS_END_TC

        public void NOTIFICATIONS_AT_OWNERS_END_TC()
        Summary
        Notifications at Owner's end
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select Folder
        3. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        4. Add Shared UserName
        5. Login with another user
        6. Accept Folder Invitation
        7. File added by reviewer
        8. Folder added by reviewer
        9. File renamed by reviewer
        10. Folder renamed by reviewer
        11. Clean Metadata operation on file by reviewer
        12. Convert to PDF operation on file by reviewer
        13. Compare two files by reviewer
        14. Copy files to shared folder by reviewer (Pending)
        15. Move files to shared folder by reviewer (Pending)
        16. Copy folder to shared folder by reviewer
        17. Move folder to shared folder by reviewer
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify Notifications at Owner's end

        8. Folder added by owner

        12. Folder removed by owner

        14. Move files to shared folder by owner

        16. Move folder to shared folder by owner
        Expected Result:

      • CHECK_ACTIVITY_LOGS_AT_OWNERS_END_TC

        public void CHECK_ACTIVITY_LOGS_AT_OWNERS_END_TC()
                                          throws java.awt.AWTException,
                                                 java.lang.Exception
        Summary
        Check Activity Logs at Owner's end
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select Folder
        3. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        4. Add Shared UserName
        5. Add file to share folder
        6. Add folder to share folder
        7. Login with another user
        8. Accept Folder Invitation
        9. File downloaded by reviewer
        10. Folder downloaded by reviewer
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify Activity Logs at Owner's end
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when any exception occurs
        java.awt.AWTException - Signals that an Abstract Window Toolkit exception has occurred

      • CHECK_ALL_SHARED_ITEMS_BY_USER_TC

        public void CHECK_ALL_SHARED_ITEMS_BY_USER_TC()
                                       throws java.awt.AWTException,
                                              java.lang.Exception
        Summary
        Check Shared items by clicking on User name
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select Folder
        3. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        4. Add Shared UserName
        5. Login with another user
        6. Accept Folder Invitation
        7. Click on Owner's name in Dashbaord
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify Shared folder is displayed in the list
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when any exception occurs
        java.awt.AWTException - Signals that an Abstract Window Toolkit exception has occurred

      • CHECK_COPY_SHARED_FOLDER_TO_ANOTHER_LOCATION_BY_REVIEWER_TC

        public void CHECK_COPY_SHARED_FOLDER_TO_ANOTHER_LOCATION_BY_REVIEWER_TC()
        Summary
        Check functionality of Copy Shared folder to another location by reviewer
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Login with One user
        2. Select Folder
        3. Click on Share button in ToolBar
        4. Add Shared UserName
        5. Login with another user
        6. Accept Folder Invitation
        7. Copy shared folder to another location
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify folder should be copied to another location with reviewer's name

      • DELETE_FILES_FOLDER_CREATED

        public void DELETE_FILES_FOLDER_CREATED()
        Summary
        Delete extra files and folders created during all the test cases of Share folder
        Pre-Conditions
        DashBoard page should be open
        Steps
        1. Select folder
        2. Click on delete button in ToolBar
        3. Click on OK button
        Expected Result:
        1. Verify folders which were created during all the Share folder test cases should not be present to root location
